about.title: About us
about.p1: Hasake Co., Ltd. is the official representative office in Vietnam of the HKS Group with over 20 years of establishment and development. Our head office is located in Bangkok, Thailand, and we also have representative offices and factories in Malaysia, India, China, Canada, South Korea, Italy, the United States, Hungary, the Philippines, and more.
about.p2: We provide and install indoor and outdoor playground equipment for children such as slides, spring riders, play structures, bumper cars, swings, seesaws, ball pits, carousels, trampolines, etc., as well as outdoor fitness equipment, bowling equipment, amusement equipment, water park equipment, and safety rubber flooring.
about.p3: Our products are manufactured to European standards (ISO 9001 certification), ensuring safety, non-toxicity, and are used in many countries around the world.
about.p4: We maintain professional teams in each location, always ready to serve and meet customer needs in the best possible way.

season.title: Season avanue
season.p1: Season avanue is a collection of seasonal play solutions proposed by Hasake for shopping malls and mixed-use complexes. Each area is optimized for crowd flow, parental visibility, and durable materials that meet international safety standards.
season.p2: The modular design enables quick theme upgrades and seasonal replacements without long downtime. Rubber flooring, soft edge protection, and antimicrobial coating support safe operations, easy cleaning, and lower maintenance costs.

bowling.title: Green bowling
bowling.p1: Green bowling targets family-friendly bowling spaces with smart lane layouts, child barriers, and an intuitive scoring UI. Energy-saving LED lighting and low-emission materials help reduce operational consumption.
bowling.p2: Hasake provides end-to-end design and installation services: floorplan optimization, acoustic standards, and scheduled maintenance processes — all to enhance experience, increase dwell time, and optimize revenue for FEC/retailtainment models.

water.title: Water park
water.p1: Hasake's water park solutions include FRP slides, splash pads, interactive fountains, tipping buckets, along with a compliant circulation–filtration–disinfection system. Designs prioritize slide safety, anti-slip surfaces, and fast drainage.
water.p2: Our delivery process follows standards from site survey, concept design, shop drawings, construction to commissioning. We train on-site staff and provide maintenance to ensure safe, stable year-round operations.

contact.privacyNote: We protect your information according to ISO-aligned privacy standards.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Hasake Co., Ltd.
meta.description: How Hasake Co., Ltd. collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you interact with us.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information when you use our website and communicate with us.

sections.title: 1. Scope & Applicability
items: This Policy applies to any personal data collected by Hasake when you visit and use our Site, or when you communicate with us.
By using our Site or submitting information to us (via forms, email, phone, etc.), you agree to the practices described here.

blocks.subtitle: a) Information You Voluntarily Provide
items: Contact / quote / consultation forms.
Name, email, phone, company or organization, and project details (e.g., playground size, type).
Any information shared via email, phone, or other channels.

blocks.subtitle: b) Automatically Collected Information
items: IP address, browser type, OS, device details.
Pages visited, time on page, referring/exit pages, clicks/interactions.
Cookies and similar tracking technologies.

sections.title: 3. Use of Your Information
items: Respond to inquiries, provide quotes, and follow up on project requests.
Improve and personalize our website and user experience.
Analyze site usage for performance and optimization.
Send important updates or communications when necessary.
Enhance security and protect against misuse or fraud.

sections.title: 4. Cookies & Tracking Technologies
items: We use cookies (and similar technologies) to understand usage, remember preferences, and improve the web experience.
You can disable cookies in your browser, but some features may be limited.

sections.title: 5. Sharing Your Information
items: We do not sell your personal data.
We may share with service providers (hosting, analytics) or partners/contractors as needed for quotations or project services.
We may disclose data to authorities if required by law or to protect our rights.
All third parties are required to keep data confidential and use it only for the intended purpose.

sections.title: 6. Data Security
items: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data.
No internet transmission or storage is 100% secure; absolute security cannot be guaranteed.

sections.title: 7. Data Retention
items: We keep your data only as long as needed to fulfill its purpose (e.g., follow up on a quote or project).
On deletion requests or consent withdrawal, we erase data unless a legal or legitimate business reason requires retention.

sections.title: 8. Your Rights
items: Access, correct/update, or delete your personal data.
Withdraw consent or object to certain processing.
Contact us to exercise these rights.

sections.title: 9. Third-Party Links
items: Our Site may link to external websites (e.g., partners, suppliers).
We are not responsible for their privacy practices; please review their policies separately.

sections.title: 10. Children's Privacy
items: Our Site is generally not intended for children under 13.
We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13; if you believe we have, contact us to remove it.

sections.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
items: We may update this Policy from time to time.
Changes will be posted here with an updated 'Last Updated' date. Please review periodically.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests about your personal data or this Privacy Policy, please reach out:
contact.address: 5th Floor, 27K Tran Nhat Duat, Tan Dinh Ward, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
